model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IGame

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGame, java.io.Serializable
    This class is the core of the game model. It instanciates the cards, the players, the coins stock, handle the current player...
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Titouan LE BERRE
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Mode mode,
            int nbPlayers,
            int humanPlayers,
            Batisseurs bat)
        The class' constructor, create the game main elements (players, cards).
        Parameters:
        mode - The game's mode, necessary to the players instanciation.
        nbPlayers - The total number of players
        humanPlayers - The number of "real" players
        bat - The Batisseurs object that instanciated the current object

      • Game

        public Game(Mode mode,
            Difficulty diff,
            int nbPlayers,
            int HumanPlayers)
        The class' second constructor, with an additional Difficulty parameter.
        Parameters:
        mode - The game's mode, necessary to the players instanciation.
        diff - The game's difficulty.
        nbPlayers - The total number of players
        HumanPlayers - The number of "real" players

      • createPlayers

        public void createPlayers(int nbH,
                          int nbP,
                          Mode mode)
        This method create the players that will be playing during the game. The name is get thanks to a Scanner.
        Parameters:
        nbH - The number of HumanPlayer objects to create.
        nbP - The total number of players.
        mode - The game mode, that indicate if AutoPlayer objects have to be created.

      • createCards

        public void createCards(java.lang.String path)
        This method create the batch of cards needed for the game, thanks to a .csv file
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the folder containing the 3 .csv files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the path is wrong/lead to nothing.
